mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CLEAN_USER (userid, passwd, email, address, phone, reg_date, update_date) values (#{userid}, #{passwd}, #{email}, #{address}, #{phone}, sysdate, sysdate)
mapper.update: UPDATE CLEAN_USER SET PASSWD=#{passwd}, EMAIL=#{email}, ADDRESS=#{address}, BIN=#{bin}, LAT=#{lat}, LON=#{lon}, CAP=#{cap}, PHONE=#{phone}, CONDITION=#{condition} WHERE USERID=#{userid}
